meanings.definition: to go back on a promise or commitment
meanings.sent1: She renegued on her promise to help with the project.
meanings.sent2: He always renegues on his plans at the last minute.
meanings.sent3: The cat renegued on its decision to chase the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun renegued on its commitment to shine brightly all day.
meanings.sent5: The student renegued on studying for the test, opting to play video games instead.

meanings.definition: having renegued on a promise or commitment
meanings.sent1: The renegued agreement left everyone disappointed.
meanings.sent2: She felt guilty for being renegued on by her friend.
meanings.sent3: The renegued cake recipe turned out surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent4: His renegued loyalty cost him the trust of his teammates.
meanings.sent5: The renegued promise hung heavy on his conscience.

meanings.definition: a person who renegues on promises or commitments
meanings.sent1: Beware of that renegued, he cannot be trusted.
meanings.sent2: The renegued always finds excuses to avoid responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: The renegued's actions left a trail of broken promises.
meanings.sent4: She was labeled as a renegued after failing to keep her word.
meanings.sent5: The renegued's reputation preceded him wherever he went.
